Pistol_Shot.display_help: Quickly fires a round from one of your heavy automatic pistols. Damage is average, but the fire rate is very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Dual_Wield.display_help: Fires both pistols at once at a time target. Firing both pistols at once is slower than a single shot, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Empty_Clips.display_help: You empty the clips of both your pistols in a arc of suppression fire. This attack can blast multiple foes in the affected cone area, and has a small chance of knocking some foes down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Tough.display_help: While active, you are tough and slightly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage. You must be at least level 14 and have Boxing or Kick before selecting Tough.
Tough.display_attacker_hit: You are now Tough, and are slightly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage.

Weave.display_help: While active, you bob and weave, increasing your Defense to all attacks, as well as your resistance to Immobilize. You must be at least level 20 and have two other Fighting Powers before selecting Weave.
Weave.display_attacker_hit: You start to Weave and are now harder to hit and Immobilize.

Combat_Jumping.display_help: While active, Combat Jumping increases your Defense to all attacks, and adds resistance to Immobilization. Moderately increases your jump height and distance while providing good air control.
Combat_Jumping.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has made you harder to hit.

Acrobatics.display_help: While this power is active, you are very nimble and Acrobatic. You can avoid most Knockback effects and are resistant to Hold effects. You must be at least level 20 and have two other Leaping Powers before selecting Acrobatics.

Energized_Shield.display_help: Kinetic Shield creates a harmonic Energy Aura that can deflect physical attacks. Your Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks is increased as weapons and powers like bullets, blades and punches tend to deflect off the shield. Kinetic Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. The Energy based nature of Kinetic Shield also offers some minimal Defense to Energy attacks. Recharge: Fast
Energized_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Energy), Res(DeBuff DEF)
Energized_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You Kinetic Shield increased you Defense to Lethal, Smashing, and to some degree, Energy attacks.

Push_Back.display_help: You attempt to Shatter the bones of your opponent by striking them with all your might. This attack will deal great damage and can knock foes back a great ways. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

Slash.display_help: You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Slice.display_help: You Slice your sword in a wide arc, attacking all enemies in front of you. Slice does less damage than Slash, but can hit multiple foes and reduces their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Slice.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

Resistance.display_help: Hercules Titans are resistant to all damage. Since they are machines, they are immune to Sleep and Fear powers.

Dispersion_Bubble.display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increase defense to all attacks except psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies inside from Immobilization, Disorient and Hold effects.
Dispersion_Bubble.display_target_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increase defense to all attacks except psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies inside from Immobilization, Disorient and Hold effects.
Dispersion_Bubble.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

Resistance.display_help: Spectres are non corporeal and highly resistant to Immobilization smashing, lethal and negative energy damage. However, they are vulnerable to Energy and Psionic damage.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Smash, Lethal, Negative, Immobilize

Resistance.display_target_short_help: Auto Res Smash, Lethal, Negative, Immobilize

Ethereal.display_help: Spectres can make themselves Ethereal and shift out of the material plane. Ethereal Spectres are invisible, and cannot affect or be affected by those in normal space.
Ethereal.display_target_help: Spectres can make themselves Ethereal and shift out of the material plane. Ethereal Spectres are invisible, and cannot affect or be affected by those in normal space.
